location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch Map of the Retirement from Butaniyeh Camp to Nasiriyah. 7th February 1916'

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1714, Nov. 1916.Distinctive Features:Sketch map produced to accompany ‘Report on Operations Against Arab Tribesmen on Euphrates Line' showing the movements of British military forces with the approximate boundary of Kafajah and Azairich marked.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.
